layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutNGBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutNGBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 251x19
        text run at (0,0) width 251: "UTF-8 \x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}\x{E9}"
